subject: Order Confirmation
description_text:
Hello,

I have submitted an order on Thursday which I do understand was
thanksgiving and might delay orders, but I haven’t received an order
confirmation email yet. I have checked spam and it’s not there and I tried
signing in with shop to see if there was order status info but it says no
orders have been placed.  I was hoping to receive a status update soon.

-Ben Dyer

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 7380 中
